about_the_game:
Buy old hovels, repaint, redecorate, clean and even build rodent traps and bring the firehouse back to life! Become a hero in one of the cities in the United States and keep residents safe.

Clean up the scrap metal and sell valuables at the junkyard.

Take on the role of a mechanic, cleaner, rodent and insect control expert, decorator, and firefighter himself, whose mission is to repair all fire trucks, check the correctness of the firefighting equipment, buy new equipment and equip the entire fire station!

Make the local community feel safe through your hard work. The game will give you the opportunity to demonstrate your skills in operating firefighting equipment while fighting dangerous fires. Roll up your sleeves and get to work, future Firefighter!

RENEW A FIRE FIGHTING HOUSE

  • equip the exercise room
  • stock the canteen
  • prepare a warehouse
  • decorate the day room
  • keep the whole station clean

MANAGE PEST CONTROL

  • investigate the problem with pests
  • prepare mechanical and chemical traps
  • get rid of the intruders

UNIQUE FEATURES

  • Clean the dirtiest mess that You have ever seen
  • Recruit Firefighters to eliminate staff shortages
  • Replace all broken fire engines/station equipment
  • Deliver energy, water and other utilities
  • Clean station and fire engines

  • Processor: Intel Core i3 3.2 GHz, AMD Phenom II X4 955 - 4 Core, 3.2 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 560 / Radeon HD6870

short_description: FIRE STATION RENOVATION is a renovator simulator for abandoned and forgotten fire stations. Buy old hovels, repaint, redecorate, clean and even build rodent traps and bring the firehouse back to life!
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Traditional Chinese, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Polish, Portuguese - Portugal, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Turkish
*languages with full audio support
